headbox.headboxDescription2: yo | Driver Licence | First aid diploma

accueil.title: Welcom!
accueil.description2: You will find my CV, my projects and contact informations.

cat1.title: Objective
cat1.description: Currently in engineering school, I wish to deepen my knowledge in IT development, websites or applications to perfect my passion for computer science.

cat2.title: Experience
cont: 5 weeks internship at Milvue, AI start-up to detect various pathologies in radiology. Development of the Hubspot CRM (Customer Relationship Management) tool & Web Site Design.

General Secretary of the Télécom SudParis Student Office. Worked with a team of 35 people. Helped prepare an integration weekend organised entirely by the BDE for the students, as well as numerous parties for several hundred students.
Project leader of a team of 5 people. Work with young people in a neighbourhood centre in Evry to introduce them to theatre.

prog.title: Python
description: Since 4 years, within 2 years in preparatory school, many projects (school and personal). Creation of a website with the Django framework.

prog.title: SQLite & MySQL
description: I took a course to discover the SQLite language and a more advanced course in engineering school on modelling, class diagrams (UML), as well as normalisation.

prog.title: OCaml
description: Preparatory class computer science option course.

prog.title: Mobile applications (Java, XML, Swift)
description: I made an application for Android and IOS/Mac (TheCode) pour Android et IOS/Mac. I also made for an engineering school project a mobile application (not deployed) of a chatbot that manages a schedule (Jimi The Chatbot)

prog.title: Site web (HTML, CSS, PHP, Symfony, Doctrine, Django)
description: Some web pages (available on my site) including TheCode and a random french poem generator (here)
A PHP magic card sharing project (Liliana's Trade), using the PHP frameworks Symfony and Doctrine, and Bootstrap.

lang.title: English - Fluent
lang.description: 11 years during my studies, numerous language stays abroad, C1 level

lang.title: Italian - Basic
lang.description: 3 years in high school, Niveau A2

autre.title: Project Managment:
autre.title2: Validation of the Project Management MOOC
autre.description:
Validation of the core of the Project Management MOOC (MOOC Gestion de projet) and three specialisations:
- Common core
- Web tools and applications for project management
- Advanced Planning
- Strategic Analysis in Projects

form.title: ENGINEERING SCHOOL • 2021-2024 • TÉLÉCOM SUD-PARIS • INSTITUT POLYTECHNIQUE DE PARIS ÉVRY
form.description:
School of Digital Engineering. Second year in progress.
Computer science courses: Java, Bash, PHP, C; networks; imaging and mathematics.

form.title: CPGE • 2019-2021 • LYCÉE LA MARTINIÈRE MONPLAISIR LYON 8
form.description:
Two-year study course preparing for the presitigious French ‘Grandes Écoles’ (engineering schools).
Specialized in Maths, Physics and Computer Science

form.title: High School Degree • 2019 • LYCÉE JEAN MICHEL LONS-LE-SAUNIER
form.description: High School Scientific Degree (Baccalauréat), Main courses: Maths, Physics, Biology | 18.47/20 Highest Honors

hobb.title: Guitar
hobb.description:
For the past 10 years
8 years of courses
Many concerts at my music school or high school

hobb.title: Cinema
hobb.description:
Cinéphile
Several video productions for professionals
President of the film club of Télécom SudParis
Third prize in the Auvergne-Rhone-Alpes regional student short film competition

hobb.title: Theatre
hobb.description:
Passionate about theatre
Discovery internship in 2014 at the "Scène du Jura" at the theatre of Lons-le-Saunier
Compagnon of the "Scènes du Jura" in 2018 where I was able to meet artists (directors, writers, dancers...) and do workshops
Participation in two plays at Télécom SudParis

hobb.title: Programming
hobb.description: Passionate about programming, especially cybersecurity (TIPE (project in preparatory class) - one year research on passwords, hash functions and current attacks, 18/20 at the final exam)

proj.title: Liliana's Trade
proj.description: Website developed during my second year of engineering school for a school project. Developed with Symfony and Composer to make an application that manages collections of Magics cards, decks and cards linked to accounts

proj.title: Comics
proj.description: Website to store & find all the comics of my mother

proj.title: JIMI The Chatbot
proj.description: Application of a chatbot that allows to manage one's schedule from a chat. Developed with python for message understanding, and with Android Studio and Java for the application interface. Non-deployed application (local server).

proj.title: Poeme
proj.description: Random poem generator with rhyme and foot. Project for the end of the first year of preparatory class in computer science with the use of SQLite

proj.title: Il n'est jamais trop tard pour changer le monde
proj.description: Short film produced for the CROUS student short film competition, third prize in the Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes region

proj.title: La mesure du temps dans l'Antiquité
proj.description: Website on the measurement of time in Antiquity made for the TPE of première in 2018
